title: Why Is It So Difficult to Regulate Tech Monopolies?
text: Investor's don't believe that regulators will be able to break up modern monopolies

title: Facebook moderators say company has risked their lives by forcing them back to the office
text: More than 200 Facebook content moderators have urged Mark Zuckerberg to let them work from home during the pandemic.

title: 7 of the Best Stocks to Buy as We Head Into the Holidays
text: Markets are rallying into year-end as investors react to positive news. Here are seven stocks to buy for the 2020 holiday season.

title: Facebook, Twitter hearings show 'lack of transparency' on content moderation, legal expert says
text: Iverna McGowan, European office director at the Center for Technology and Democracy, gives an analysis of the delicate line between stemming the flow of misinformation and user censorship.

title: Facebook, Twitter CEOs Defend Their Election Actions To The Senate
text: Facebook, Inc (NASDAQ: FB) CEO Mark Zuckerberg and Twitter Inc (NYSE: TWTR) CEO Jack Dorsey appeared before the Senate in a virtual meeting to defend their actions surrounding the 2020 presidential election on Tuesday. Senators grilled the social media honchos on questions surrounding election misinformation control, censorship, and the need for regulation and changes to Section 230  of the Communications Decency Act, the liability shield for internet companies.
